text: The Naked City is a 1948 American crime drama movie directed by Jules Dassin and stars Barry Fitzgerald, Howard Duff, Dorothy Hart, Don Taylor, Frank Conroy, Adelaide Klein. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. It was nominated for 3 Academy Awards and won 2 Oscars in 1949. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1948 crime drama movies Category:1940s American crime drama movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Jules Dassin Category:Movies set in the 1940s
title: The Naked City
